home.title: Secure, Open Source, and Free PDF Tools
home.description: Process all your PDFs directly in your browser, completely offline and secure. Your files are never uploaded to our servers. Core features: merge PDFs, split PDFs, edit pages, delete pages, and rotate pages. Easy drag-and-drop interface and 100% FREE!
home.alert: The application runs entirely on the client side. Therefore, some PDF files—especially those with complex forms—may not be processed correctly. Please remember to review the output.
